name: Save Mr Blob! (PixelatorGadzy)
description:
Mr. Blob has been trapped in a very dangerous and odd facility. He just wants to leave so he can go back to his blobby family. Can you please help him out?

Controls:

Press A to turn On Platforms

Press D to turn Off Platforms

Press W to tell Mr Blob to move faster

Press S if Mr Blob get's stuck

Press Space to Select

Hi. This is not the Jam version of the game. If that's what you're looking for or are just curious, you can find that here: https://pixelatorgadzy.itch.io/save-mr-blob-jam-version
